definition: mouth and teeth/enunciation/to articulate/diction/age (of cattle, horses etc)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
eloquent and fluent speaker (idiom); grandiloquence/the gift of the gab
eloquence that generates perfume (idiom); profound and significant text

sentences.english: When you go into the interview, speak clearly so you can be heard.
sentences.chinese: 口試時要口齒清晰讓考官和搭檔能夠聽清你的話。

sentences.english: That man is not very articulate.
At that time his both legs were unable to walk normally, speak some enunciations not to be unclear.
sentences.chinese: 當時他的雙腿就無法正常行走，說話有些口齒不清。

sentences.english: Whilst starting to learn lisp, I've come across the term tail-recursive.
sentences.chinese: 雖然開始學習口齒不清，我遇到這個詞的尾遞歸的。

sentences.english: Articulate speech is essential for a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 對教師來說，口齒清楚是必不可少的。
那孩子口齒不清地禱告。
她口齒不清地做了一個回答。

sentences.english: The little boy lisped out his story.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩口齒不清地講了他的故事。

sentences.english: It is believed that girls are usually more articulate than boys.
sentences.chinese: 通常來講，女孩子比男孩子口齒更伶俐。

sentences.english: I am sure Tom can persuade her. He has kissed the Blarney stone.
sentences.chinese: 蕩姆口齒伶俐，相信一定可以說服她的。

sentences.english: Leave an inarticulate, angry comment below.
sentences.chinese: 留下一段口齒不清的，怒火中燒的評論吧。

sentences.english: The pupil lisped out the answer.
sentences.chinese: 小學生口齒不清地說出答案。

sentences.english: A good tongue is a good weapon.
sentences.chinese: 伶俐的口齒是一種銳利的武器。

sentences.english: An articulate, educated man, M is still quitestrong.
sentences.chinese: M是位口齒伶俐，受過教育的人，也非常強壯。

sentences.english: She teaches children to sing and speak clearly.
sentences.chinese: 她教孩子們唱歌說話要口齒清楚。

sentences.english: The man is not very articulate.
sentences.chinese: 那個人口齒不十分清楚。

definition: lit. lips and teeth (idiom); fig. close partners/interdependent
dilettante/amateur/to dabble in/to flirt with (a topic)
one's four limbs/two arms and two legs
orpiment/arsenic trisulfide As2S3/make changes in writing/malign/criticize without grounds
